content: Yes, the season is always an exciting time for football fans, and the Bengals have the potential to surprise people and make some noise in the league. Burrow has shown the ability to perform at a high level, and with the roster upgrades, the Bengals have a chance to compete and make progress in their rebuild. It will be interesting to see how the team progresses throughout the season, and whether they can live up to the expectations placed on them.
